mapper.select: SELECT FOOD_NAME FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU JOIN FOOD USING (FOOD_NAME) WHERE MENU_DATE IN #{menuDate} AND MENU_MORNING IN 'Y'
SELECT FOOD_NAME FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU JOIN FOOD USING (FOOD_NAME) WHERE MENU_DATE IN #{menuDate} AND MENU_LUNCH IN 'Y'
SELECT FOOD_NAME FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU JOIN FOOD USING (FOOD_NAME) WHERE MENU_DATE IN #{menuDate} AND MENU_EVEN IN 'Y'
SELECT FOOD_NAME FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU JOIN FOOD USING (FOOD_NAME) WHERE MENU_DATE IN #{menuDate} AND MENU_SNACK IN 'Y'

SELECT MENU_DATE, SUM(FOOD_CALORIE * (FOOD_GRAM * MENU_GRAM)) FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU JOIN FOOD USING (FOOD_NAME) WHERE FOOD_NAME IN ( SELECT FOOD_NAME FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU ) AND ID = #{id} GROUP BY MENU_DATE ORDER BY MENU_DATE ASC

SELECT MENU_DATE, SUM(FOOD_CALORIE * (FOOD_GRAM * MENU_GRAM)) FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU JOIN FOOD USING (FOOD_NAME) WHERE FOOD_NO IN ( SELECT FOOD_NO FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU ) AND MENU_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, - #{month}) AND SYSDATE AND ID = #{id} GROUP BY MENU_DATE ORDER BY MENU_DATE ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MENTEE_DAY_MENU WHERE ID = #{id} AND MENU_DATE = #{menuDate} AND FOOD_NAME = #{foodName} AND MENU_MORNING = #{menuMorning} AND MENU_LUNCH = #{menuLunch} AND MENU_EVEN = #{menuEven} AND MENU_SNACK = #{menuSnack}
